text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response clearly explains the connection test under the heading 'B. Connection / Nexus with the Investor's Claim'. It states the standard formulations derived from ICSID Article 46 and UNCITRAL Article 21(3) (analogized to the same investment relationship) and summarizes the general gloss that the counterclaim must arise from the same investment, facts, or legal relationship. It also provides practical examples from leading cases (Burlington, Perenco, Urbaser) to illustrate how the nexus is assessed.", "criterion_id": "cd01ecfc-f099-45f9-9f56-ede0fb8737cb"}
